Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:10#18#naga leviathans} seem to get the other nagas riled up whenever there's a big battle.

I wonder whether targeting the leviathans will impact the nagas' will to fight. We need to know how.

Only one way to find out, I suppose. See if you can kill the leviathans and make the nagas miserable, .

Must be something in these jars. I'll pass them up to some stuffy scholar. They can figure it out.

Great work, !

Look, just because they're called {@LinkCreature:10#18#naga leviathans} doesn't mean they're dangerous.

You can take 'em.
